inclusion.criterion: Cirrhosis of any etiology with grade 2 ascites including refractory patients and varices/variceal hemorrhage requiring prophylaxis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Cirrhosis diagnosed by clinical, analytical, and ultrasonographic findings or available histological findings
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Presence of hepatocellular carcinoma or portal vein thrombosis
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Severe heart, respiratory or contraindications for beta blockers(severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, severe asthma, severe insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus, bradyarrhythmia)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Active infection or recent infection < 2 weeks
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has cirrhosis with varices and recent UGIB, but is off ETOH for a year. Has been diagnosed with hepatic encephalopathy.
